segments.text: I'm looking at the two children over by the counter, they're up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a wobbly-looking stool, reaching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside that "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, I guess to catch the cookies or maybe cover his tracks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm outstretched, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is really quite impressive for a covert operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so quiet, trying not to draw any attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's clever how they've positioned themselves behind the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she ever suspects these little raids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic sibling conspiracy unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip, though, it looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR
